snippet: The level of hatred in Central African Republic between Muslims and Christians has been underestimated and is creating a "nearly impossible" situation for African Union and French forces to combat, France's U.N. envoy said on Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: Central Africa Republic Religious Hatred Was Underestimated: France
headline.main: Central Africa Republic Religious Hatred Was Underestimated: France

lead_paragraph: The level of hatred in Central African Republic between Muslims and Christians has been underestimated and is creating a "nearly impossible" situation for African Union and French forces to combat, France's U.N. envoy said on Wednesday.
